bug.author: srochel
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/mxnet-model-server/blob/master/docs/mms_on_fargate.md>https://github.com/awslabs/mxnet-model-server/blob/master/docs/mms_on_fargate.md</denchmark-link>
See: With the current release of MMS, 1.0, Official pre-configured, optimized container images of MMS are provided on Docker hub. awsdeeplearningteam/mxnet-model-server:1.0.0-mxnet-cpu Link to awsdeeplearningteam/mxnet-model-server:1.0.0-mxnet-cpu is creating 404

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this issue. We will fix the broken link.
